document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2017-04
document.heading: AN INTERIM URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, ENACTED PURSUANT TO CALIFORNIA GOVERNMENT CODE SECTION 65858 APPROVING AN ADDITIONAL 6-MONTH MORATORIUM ON DEVELOPMENT, ESTABLISHMENT AND OPERATION OF NEW WIRELESS TELECOMMUNICATION FACILITIES IN THE PUBLIC RIGHT-OF-WAY IN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON PENDING REVIEW AND POSSIBLE AMENDMENT OF MUNICIPAL CODE REGULATIONS APPLICABLE TO SUCH FACILITIES
